definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
grave/tomb/graveyard/cemetery/fig. one's native place (where one's ancestors are buried)
hill cemetery/graveyard/grave/grave mound/low wall at the back of a traditional tomb
Shouwangfen town, in Chengde 承德市[Cheng2 de2 shi4], Hebei
Shouwangfen town, in Chengde 承德市[Cheng2 de2 shi4], Hebei

sentences.english: They weeded the mounds and piled fresh dirt atop.
sentences.chinese: 他們剷除墳上的雜草，再將在墳頂堆上新鮮的土。

sentences.english: Exhume the light from its watery grave to receive the gift of heaven.
sentences.chinese: 光從水墳中撅出來，接受上天的禮物。

sentences.english: Graveyard recursion is a huge theme for the green and black guild.
sentences.chinese: 黑綠重要的主題之一就是掘墳。
她的墳正象她的牀一樣。

sentences.english: Marius had taken Cosette to his father's grave.
sentences.chinese: 馬呂斯帶珂賽特去上他父親的墳。

sentences.english: The earth can yield me but a common grave.
sentences.chinese: 大地只能夠給我一座亂葬墳。

sentences.english: Everyone has a tomb, there lived a grave.
sentences.chinese: 每個人心裏都有一座墳，墳裏住着未亡人。

sentences.english: Everyone has a tomb, there lived a grave.
sentences.chinese: 每個人心裏都有一座墳，墳裏住着未亡人。

sentences.english: Graves are visited and fires might be lit to guide the spirits home.
sentences.chinese: 人們會去墳上上墳並給點起火把給回家的靈魂引路。

sentences.english: He went to an open wild and dug himself a grave.
sentences.chinese: 他來到一片空曠的野地裏，給自己挖了一個墳。

sentences.english: You are of the half-open door, and dig the grave hole will wait outside the door.
sentences.chinese: 你們是半開的門，而挖墳穴的人就等在門外。

sentences.english: Every year on the anniversary of the date she died, they would offer sacrifices to her grave.
sentences.chinese: 嗣後每年忌日兩人都到她的墳前祭祀。

sentences.english: The tomb was exactly lining along with the Hua’s son’s while there was a small path in between.
sentences.chinese: 那墳與小栓的墳，一字兒排着，中間只隔一條小路。

sentences.english: The tomb was exactly lining along with the Hua’s son’s while there was a small path in between.
sentences.chinese: 那墳與小栓的墳，一字兒排着，中間只隔一條小路。

sentences.english: I place a delphinium, Blue, upon your grave.
sentences.chinese: 我摘下一株飛燕草，藍色的，放在你的墳前。

sentences.english: Several years of difficult, not afraid of grave face, Li long.
sentences.chinese: 數載難見，人面不識，怕墳前久立。

definition: to sweep a grave (and pay one's respects to the dead person)
